Definition: Given a text perform grammatical evaluation and output rating as 'poor' or 'good'

Positive Examples.input: Afterall there will be an endless battle between the technology and human mentality.
Positive Examples.explanation: Afterall is not a word. It is a errorous concatination of two words 'After' and 'all', still the reader would not get the wrong message. Hence fine.

Negative Examples.input: People in current era are described as demanding or having high level of life expectancies in another word..
Negative Examples.explanation: In other word are conventionally used in the starting of a statement that rephrases the previous statement
